howItWorks.step1Desc: Tell us about your experience and motivations. Once approved, you'll join a network of passionate professional.
howItWorks.step2Desc: We'll connect you with students based on your expertise and availability.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Share your insights through 1-on-1 or group sessions - and earn for every session you deliver.

testimonials.title: Here's what other coaches are saying

jack.name: Jack Hugo
jack.quote: Coaching on Nebula has been incredibly rewarding. It's amazing to see students grow - and getting paid to do it is a bonus.

sarah.name: Sarah Cuoco
sarah.quote: I love how flexible the platform is. I can share real-world insights on my own schedule and make a real difference.

hero.heading:
Empower your career
journey with Nebula
hero.description: Get online career coaching from the world's leading experts to help you land your dream job.
hero.searchPlaceholder: Search for a coach or specialty...

home.intermediate: We’re not just an AI platform. Our qualified coaches work alongside you, offering expert guidance that elevates your experience and accelerates your growth.

vetted.title: Vetted Coaches, Proven Results
vetted.description: Our coaches are industry leaders with years of experience in their respective fields.

testimonials.title: This is what your peers have to say

sarah.content: Nebula connected me with a fantastic coach who helped me land my dream job. The personalized advice was a game-changer!

david.content: The mock interviews were incredibly realistic. I felt so much more confident going into the real thing. Highly recommend!

emily.content: I was feeling stuck in my career. My coach provided the clarity and strategy I needed to move forward. Thank you, Nebula!

universities.title: Experiential Learning +
universities.subtitle: Career Prep
universities.inConversation: IN CONVERSATION WITH LEADING BUSINESS SCHOOLS

problem.title: The Problem
problem.p1: Universities excel at providing theoretical knowledge, but students often struggle to bridge the gap between academia and the practical demands of the job market.
problem.p2: They lack exposure to real-world business challenges and the specific interview skills needed to land competitive roles.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.p1: A powerful, internal ecosystem for practical skill-building.
solution.p2: Nebula partners with your institution to design a custom job immersion program. We leverage your most valuable asset, your alumni network, to connect experienced professionals with current students for 1-on-1 coaching.
solution.p3: This creates a powerful, internal ecosystem where students practice real-world case studies and gain practical skills directly from experts who have walked the same path, giving them the confidence to launch their careers.

employability.title: Enhance Employability
employability.description: Equip your students with the real-world skills and interview practice they need to stand out to top employers.

alumni.title: Activate Your Alumni Network
alumni.description: Transform your alumni from a passive resource into an active, engaged community of mentors, strengthening ties back to your institution.

scale.title: Scale Career Services
scale.description: Supplement your existing career services with on-demand, expert coaching from a global network of professionals.

step1.title: Partner with Us
step1.description: We'll work with you to create a custom plan that fits the needs of your institution and your students.

step2.title: Onboard Students
step2.description: Students sign up and get personalized recommendations for coaches and programs based on their career interests.

step3.title: Track Progress
step3.description: Gain insights into student engagement and career readiness through our dedicated university dashboard.

cta.title: Ready to empower your students?
cta.description: Partner with Nebula to give your students the competitive edge they need to succeed in today's job market.

oneMoreThing.title: One More Thing...
oneMoreThing.description: By partnering with us, you’ll gain early access to our next-generation virtual workplace simulation, currently in development, designed to feel real, dynamic, and challenging.

q1.question: How much does it cost for a university to partner with Nebula?
q1.answer: Our partnership is free for a stipulated time, which is mutually agreed upon with each university. We offer flexible pilot programs to demonstrate value before any long-term commitment.

q2.question: How are the coaches selected?
q2.answer: We work directly with you to recruit and onboard coaches from your own talented alumni network. This ensures that students receive guidance from professionals who share their academic background and can provide highly relevant industry insights.

q3.question: Can we integrate Nebula with our existing career services platform?
q3.answer: While direct technical integrations are not yet available, we partner closely with your career services team. We collaborate to design and implement a seamless job immersion program that complements your existing offerings, leveraging coaches from your alumni network.

nextStep.title: Take the Next Step
nextStep.description: Let's discuss how Nebula can help your students achieve their career goals.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacyPolicy.intro: Nebula ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform and services. Please read this policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

collect.title: 1. Information We Collect
collect.p1: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect on the Site includes:

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: Personally identifiable information, such as your name, email address, and telephone number, and demographic information, such as your age, gender, hometown, and interests, that you voluntarily give to us when you register with the Site or when you choose to participate in various activities related to the Site, such as online chat and message boards.

derivativeData.title: Derivative Data
derivativeData.description: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the Site, such as your IP address, your browser type, your operating system, your access times, and the pages you have viewed directly before and after accessing the Site.

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.p1: Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the Site to:
use.item2: Email you regarding your account or order.
use.item4: Generate a personal profile about you to make future visits to the Site more personalized.
use.item5: Monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve your experience with the Site.
use.item6: Notify you of updates to the Site.
use.item7: Offer new products, services, and/or recommendations to you.
use.item8: Request feedback and contact you about your use of the Site.

share.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
share.p1: We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows:

byLaw.title: By Law or to Protect Rights
byLaw.description: If we believe the release of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or to protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by any applicable law, rule, or regulation.

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Service Providers
thirdParties.description: We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us or on our behalf, including payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance.

rights.title: 4. Your Rights and Choices
rights.p1: You have certain rights regarding your personal information. You may at any time review or change the information in your account or terminate your account by:
rights.item1: Logging into your account settings and updating your account.
rights.item2: Contacting us using the contact information provided below.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.p1: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse.

changes.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
changes.p1: We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy at any time and for any reason. We will alert you about any changes by updating the "Last updated" date of this Privacy Policy. You are encouraged to periodically review this Privacy Policy to stay informed of updates.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform.
termsOfService.intro: Welcome to Nebula! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website, platform, and services (collectively, the "Services"). Please read these Terms carefully before using our Services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.p1: By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use our Services. We may modify these Terms at any time, and such modification will be effective upon posting on this page.

accounts.title: 2. User Accounts
accounts.p1: To access certain features of our Services, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.p1: You agree to use our Services only for lawful purposes. You are responsible for your own conduct and communications while using our Services and for any consequences thereof. You agree not to:
responsibilities.item1: Use the Services for any fraudulent or unlawful purpose.
responsibilities.item2: Post or transmit any content that is abusive, defamatory, obscene, or otherwise objectionable.
responsibilities.item3: Infringe on the intellectual property rights of others.
responsibilities.item4: Interfere with or disrupt the Services or servers or networks connected to the Services.

ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property
ip.p1: All content and materials available on Nebula, including but not limited to text, graphics, website name, code, images, and logos, are the intellectual property of Nebula and are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law. Any inappropriate use, including but not limited to the reproduction, distribution, display, or transmission of any content on this site is strictly prohibited, unless specifically authorized by Nebula.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.p1: We may terminate or suspend your access to our Services at any time, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Services will immediately cease.

disclaimers.title: 6. Disclaimers
disclaimers.p1: Our Services are provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. Nebula does not warrant that the Services will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses or other harmful components.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.p1: In no event shall Nebula, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Services.

governing.title: 8. Governing Law
governing.p1: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is based, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

about.missionDesc: To democratize access to world-class career coaching and empower individuals to achieve their professional dreams, regardless of their background or location.
about.aboutUsDesc: We’re not an AI platform. At our core, we champion human-centered interactions. That doesn’t mean we’re against AI — far from it. In fact, AI is a powerful enabler of our mission: connecting students with coaches for real-world job immersion and growth.
about.storyP1: Nebula was born from a simple observation: countless talented students were graduating with strong academic knowledge but lacked the practical, real-world skills and connections to land their dream jobs. We saw an opportunity to bridge this gap.
about.storyP2: Founded by a team of experienced professionals and educators, Nebula was created to connect students with industry experts through immersive, hands-on learning experiences. We believe that mentorship is the key to unlocking potential, and we are dedicated to building a community where knowledge is shared and careers are launched.
about.joinTeamDesc: We're always looking for passionate individuals to join us on our mission. If you believe in the power of mentorship, we'd love to hear from you.

careers.joinMissionDesc: Help us democratize access to world-class career coaching and build the future of professional development.
careers.valuesDesc: The principles that guide our work and culture.

mission.title: Mission-Driven
mission.description: We are passionate about empowering individuals to achieve their professional dreams.

student.title: Student-Centric
student.description: Our students are at the heart of everything we build and every decision we make.

innovation.title: Embrace Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly experiment and leverage technology to create better learning experiences.

ownership.title: Ownership & Impact
ownership.description: We empower our team to take ownership and make a tangible impact on our mission.

careers.noOpenRoles: We don't have any open roles at the moment, but we're always looking for talented people to join our team. Feel free to check back later.
careers.lifeDesc: We're a remote-first company with a focus on collaboration, impact, and work-life balance. We believe in empowering our team to do their best work, wherever they are.

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions.

gettingStarted.question: How do I sign up for Nebula?
gettingStarted.answer: You can sign up for a student account by clicking the "Sign Up" button on our homepage. If you are a coach, you can apply through the "Become a Coach" page.

gettingStarted.question: What is the onboarding process like?
gettingStarted.answer: Our onboarding process is a quick, three-step flow where you tell us about your interests, skill level, and commitment. This helps us personalize your dashboard with relevant programs and coaches.

account.question: How do I reset my password?
account.answer: You can reset your password by clicking the "Forgot your password?" link on the login page. You will receive an email with instructions on how to create a new password.

account.question: How can I update my profile information?
account.answer: You can update your name, email, and other personal details in the "Settings" section of your dashboard.

billing.question: Can I change my subscription plan?
billing.answer: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time from your billing settings. Changes will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

billing.question: What is the refund policy?
billing.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our subscription plans. If you are not satisfied, you can request a full refund within 30 days of your purchase.

programs.question: How do I enroll in a program or book a session?
programs.answer: To enroll in a program, visit the program's page and click 'Enroll'. For individual sessions, you can book a time directly from a coach's profile page. All your bookings will appear in the 'My Sessions' section of your dashboard.

programs.question: What is the difference between a program and an individual session?
programs.answer: Programs are structured, multi-week cohort-based experiences focused on a specific career goal. Individual sessions are one-off meetings you can book with a coach for personalized guidance on any topic.

programs.question: Can I get a certificate after completing a program?
programs.answer: Yes, upon successful completion of a program, a digital certificate of completion will be available for you to download from the 'My Sessions' section of your dashboard.

programs.question: How are coaches vetted?
programs.answer: Our coaches undergo a rigorous vetting process that includes a review of their professional experience, coaching qualifications, and a practical assessment. We only partner with top-tier experts to ensure you receive the highest quality guidance.

events.question: How do I register for an event or webinar?
events.answer: You can register for any event or webinar directly from the "Events" page. Once registered, you will receive a confirmation email with all the details.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We're excited to explore how we can work together. Please fill out the form below.

fields.messagePlaceholder: Tell us a bit about your institution and what you're looking for...

contact.futureDesc: Partner with us to create powerful learning experiences for your students.
